talk.title: Creating an Enterprise Level Call Centre using a serverless architecture
talk.abstract: How we created a completely serverless AI backed call center using Amazon Lex & Amazon Connect. Currently taking 150,000 calls a month resulting in a magnitude of cost savings of 47% with zero downtime for over a year. All with a team of serverless newbies under tight deadlines.
